head.title: Some Account of the North West Company Containing Analogy of Nations Ancient & Modern. - Abstracts

body.p: document.write(Add());New search | First Page | Notes | Abstract
Mackenzie, Roderick. Some Account of the North West Company Containing Analogy of Nations Ancient & Modern. An electronic transcription. MFTP #0029
McGill Fur Trade Project Number: MFTP 0029

div.p: The title page of Roderick MacKenzie's proposed history of the North West Company. The bound volume was most likely compiled by MacKenzie (the front paste-down has the inscription "L R Masson don de Henry McKenzie"). There is also a table of contents.

Page titre du projet d'histoire de la Compagnie du Nord-Ouest par Roderick MacKenzie. Le volume relié a très probablement été compilé par MacKenzie; sur la garde avant se trouve l'inscription "L R Masson don de Henry McKenzie". Il y a une table de matières.
